title: CAKE and CANDLES
body_text:
Not a single thing in common except their undying will to be called the best.
EastCoastDodgeball
proudly presents the third, and possibly final installment in the interminable physical debate between 2008's most vicious adversaries,
Justin Wolf
and
Juan Londono
.
Having ascended the ranks at virtually equal times in their careers, "The Writer" took it upon themself to assign each of them a spot in the coveted DODGEBALL CXL main event. Although the
Family Affair
resulted in a rare draw, it was the "Muffin Man" Londono who quickly gained the upper hand, winning the thrilling return bout just a few shorts week later.
Since then, the physicality between the two hasn't ceased - the sure cause for this next confrontation. But like the deadly
Letsche-Cornero
war at the Season 16 opener, "The Cockroach" and "The Punter" will do battle under the rare
GodMode Rules
stipulation.
DODGEBALL 158 will be as nasty and brutal as it gets. Come on out October 4 and feel the wrath of these two dodgeball monsters.
________________________________________
________________________
Feel
The Power
of this feverishly-awaited "Dream Match" at
DODGEBALL CLX
!
That's right, as announced at DODGEBALL 157,
October 18
will indeed be a night to remember when the two most powerful female entities to ever set foot on the dodgeball battlegrounds will meet head-on!
Melissa Kerr
,
Kerrin Marchese
- one epic collision!
There is any doubt this will be one of the most physically intense confrontations in all of dodgeball history. Special start time of
6pm
is in effect!
________________________________________
________________________
BERTSCH, D'LUHY:
CREAMation 8
!
Birthday Fun Included!
A special attraction on a most special occasion! Legendary veteran
Alison Bertsch
, female titan
Pamela D'Luhy
, a pie between them and a birthday boy to share it with!
Weekly fans and spectators came from all over not just to celebrate the life and times of dodgeball pro John Tronolone, but see one of the lovely ladies leave with a facefull of whipped-cream!
Flash Results by Game
Alison Bertsch: 1, 3
Pamela D'Luhy: 2
Alison 2, Pam 1.
The Rules
: Classic two-team match-up.
The Match
: Alison Bertsch defeated Pamela D'Luhy, 2 - 1, in a
CREAMation Rules
encounter.
Captains Statistics
: Bertsch 3-4-2 / D'Luhy 1-1-0.
Moments & Stars
: Chris Adams's deadly nutshot on Justin Wolf
Attendance
: 30, comprised of 20 men and 10 women
New Players
: Phillip Sullivan, Ashley Campbell
Other Notes
: This was the first female-only singles
CREAMation
match ever and the 8th overall. DODGEBALL 157 will also be remembered as
Wet War XXXI
and for being held on John Tronolone's 24th birthday.
Online Exclusive!
The
CREAMation
contest between Alison and Pam was planned a little over three months in advance.
Remember When ...
One of the most memorable, and damn sure competitive environments, came at last year's
DODGEBALL 105
which pitted arch rivals Kevin Fitzpatrick and Chris Adams one-on-one in the sport's 3rd
CREAMation
. That September   night allowed "The Axe" Adams to pick up a monumental victory over the incomparable powerhouse, exacting a great deal of revenge from their inaugural confrontation at DODGEBALL 70.
I Think It Tastes Good!
The list of those "blinded by the white" has risen yet again! Pamela D'Luhy joins the elite group of victims along with John Tronolone, Lenny Herrera, Diana DiBuccio, Kevin Fitzpatrick, Sascha Basista, Grant Cornero, Lauren Winston, Valerie Winston, and Bobby Vetrano.
body_html:
Not a single thing in common except their undying will to be called the best.

EastCoastDodgeball proudly presents the third, and possibly final installment in the interminable physical debate between 2008's most vicious adversaries, Justin Wolf and Juan Londono.

Having ascended the ranks at virtually equal times in their careers, "The Writer" took it upon themself to assign each of them a spot in the coveted DODGEBALL CXL main event. Although the Family Affair resulted in a rare draw, it was the "Muffin Man" Londono who quickly gained the upper hand, winning the thrilling return bout just a few shorts week later.

Since then, the physicality between the two hasn't ceased - the sure cause for this next confrontation. But like the deadly Letsche-Cornero war at the Season 16 opener, "The Cockroach" and "The Punter" will do battle under the rare GodMode Rules stipulation.

DODGEBALL 158 will be as nasty and brutal as it gets. Come on out October 4 and feel the wrath of these two dodgeball monsters.

________________________________________________________________


Feel The Power of this feverishly-awaited "Dream Match" at DODGEBALL CLX!

That's right, as announced at DODGEBALL 157, October 18 will indeed be a night to remember when the two most powerful female entities to ever set foot on the dodgeball battlegrounds will meet head-on! Melissa Kerr, Kerrin Marchese - one epic collision!

There is any doubt this will be one of the most physically intense confrontations in all of dodgeball history. Special start time of 6pm is in effect!

________________________________________________________________


BERTSCH, D'LUHY: CREAMation 8!
Birthday Fun Included!

A special attraction on a most special occasion! Legendary veteran Alison Bertsch, female titan Pamela D'Luhy, a pie between them and a birthday boy to share it with!

Weekly fans and spectators came from all over not just to celebrate the life and times of dodgeball pro John Tronolone, but see one of the lovely ladies leave with a facefull of whipped-cream!

Flash Results by Game
Alison Bertsch: 1, 3
Pamela D'Luhy: 2

Alison 2, Pam 1.

The Rules: Classic two-team match-up.
The Match: Alison Bertsch defeated Pamela D'Luhy, 2 - 1, in a CREAMation Rules encounter.
Captains Statistics: Bertsch 3-4-2 / D'Luhy 1-1-0.
Moments & Stars: Chris Adams's deadly nutshot on Justin Wolf
Attendance: 30, comprised of 20 men and 10 women
New Players: Phillip Sullivan, Ashley Campbell
Other Notes: This was the first female-only singles CREAMation match ever and the 8th overall. DODGEBALL 157 will also be remembered as Wet War XXXI and for being held on John Tronolone's 24th birthday.

Online Exclusive!
The CREAMation contest between Alison and Pam was planned a little over three months in advance.

Remember When ...
One of the most memorable, and damn sure competitive environments, came at last year's DODGEBALL 105 which pitted arch rivals Kevin Fitzpatrick and Chris Adams one-on-one in the sport's 3rd CREAMation. That September night allowed "The Axe" Adams to pick up a monumental victory over the incomparable powerhouse, exacting a great deal of revenge from their inaugural confrontation at DODGEBALL 70.

I Think It Tastes Good!
The list of those "blinded by the white" has risen yet again! Pamela D'Luhy joins the elite group of victims along with John Tronolone, Lenny Herrera, Diana DiBuccio, Kevin Fitzpatrick, Sascha Basista, Grant Cornero, Lauren Winston, Valerie Winston, and Bobby Vetrano.
